    • passiveBlock

      public int passiveBlock(int damage)
      Returns the amount of damage that the entity will take after its defense is subtracted from the given amount. If the defense is greater than the given amount, the method returns 1 to indicate that the entity will take at least 1 damage.
      Parameters:
      damage - the amount of damage to block
      Returns:
      the amount of damage that the entity will take

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int amount)
      Takes damage from the given amount. The damage is modified by passiveBlock() before being applied to the entity's HP.
      Specified by:
      takeDamage in interface Attack
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of damage to take

    • attack

      public void attack(Entity entity)
      Attacks the given entity with the entity's strength. The entity that is attacked will take damage equal to this entity's strength.
      Specified by:
      attack in interface Attack
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to attack
